layout.singingstanza: Say -- ing, Where is He Who has been born King of the Jews? For we saw His star at its ris -- ing, For we saw His star at its ris -- ing And have come to wor -- ship Him. And when they saw the star, They re -- joiced ex -- ceed -- ing -- ly, Re -- joiced ex -- ceed -- ing -- ly with great joy. And when they saw the star, They re -- joiced ex -- ceed -- ing -- ly, Re -- joiced ex -- ceed -- ing -- ly with great joy.

lyrics.stanza: Saying, Where is He Who has been born King of the Jews? For we saw His star at its rising, For we saw His star at its rising And have come to worship Him.
And when they saw the star, They rejoiced exceedingly, Rejoiced exceedingly with great joy. And when they saw the star, They rejoiced exceedingly, Rejoiced exceedingly with great joy.
